scenario_text.value:
Hey, Takuma. Sorry, I haven’t found anything
over here.

Aoi and Saki already gave this place a once-
over. I doubt they overlooked anything...

Now, now, no use grumbling about it. Let’s go
over this place with a fine-toothed comb.

Hearing you of all people say that just
pisses me off even more.
What? Why?!

(Minoru didn’t say anything wrong. It’s just
the way he said it. That’s nothing new...)
(What should I say here?)
That was rude, Minoru.
I hope we find a clue!

That was a rude way to say that, Minoru. Ryo
is older, you should respect him.
Exactly. Show a little respect!
Respect, he says...

Gee WHIZ, Ryo, think you can find that shrine
for us? Pretty please, with a cherry on top?

You seeing this, Takuma? That boy’s pressing
his luck again.

I wouldn’t say pressing, per se. He was just
born that way.
Yeah, what he said! I was born lucky!

Even a clue would be great, so let’s look
around one more time...

I know. Like Minoru said, we have to be
thorough...

You really get me, Shuuji! I knew you had it
in you.

Why’s this punk get to look down on me,
anyway...?

Ryo and I can handle this area. You two
should look somewhere else.
Got it! Good luck here.

Hey Shuuji, shouldn’t we have mentioned that
thing we saw?
Oh yes, you’re right.

I spotted what looked like Haru a little
while ago. It ran before I could talk to it.
We saw it too! It came our way earlier!

Still, that kid here on his own? Reminds me
of that Kenzoku that looked like Miyuki...

Yeah. We thought it may be a fake, so we
didn’t chase it.
We’re chasing him, though!

Is that right... Be careful, no telling if
it’s the real Haru or not.
Right. I’ll be careful.
Leave this area to me.
You guys go check somewhere else.
